text:
The disadvantaged business enterprise ("DBE") bid/ratings discount shall be afforded to economically disadvantaged local businesses certified under Section 
14A.5 in the award of all City contracts subject to exceptions hereinafter specifically enumerated in Sections 
14A.12 and 14A.19.
(Added by Ord. 208-04, File No. 041117, App. 8/11/2004)
